TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewTextBoxCell extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell

summary.span: 显示 控件中的可编辑文本信息。

span.span: Displays editable text information in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是特殊的类型的用来显示可编辑基于文本的信息的单个字符串。The class is a specialized type of used to display a single string of editable text-based information. 当前所选主机控制用户可以在其中编辑单元格的值 (假设属性设置为`false`)。The currently selected hosts a control in which the user can edit the cell's value (assuming the property of the is set to `false`). 列类型专用于保留此类型的单元格。The is the column type specialized to hold cells of this type. 默认情况下，函数将初始化为一个新。By default, the is initialized to a new . 若要在列的单元格模式的现有后，设置列的到要用作一种模式的单元格的属性。To pattern the cells within a column after an existing , set the column's property to the cell to use as a pattern. 列的单元格相关属性是同样名称的属性的模板单元格的包装。The cell-related properties of the column are wrappers for the similarly-named properties of the template cell. 更改模板单元格的属性值将只影响单元格在基于的模板在更改后添加。Changing the property values of the template cell will affect only cells based on the template that are added after the change. 更改列的单元格相关的属性值，但是，将更新模板单元格和列中的所有其他单元格并刷新列显示如有必要。Changing the cell-related property values of the column, however, will update the template cell and all other cells in the column, and refresh the column display if necessary. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用为模板，供。The following code example demonstrates how to use a as a template for a . 对列中的任意单元格所做的样式更改会影响所有列的单元格。Style changes made to any cell in the column affect all of the column's cells. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#120)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#120)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#120)]

para.span: 派生自并将新属性添加到派生的类，请确保重写方法以在克隆操作过程中复制新属性。

span.span: When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.

para.span: 你还应调用基类的方法，以便基类的属性复制到新的单元格。

span.span: You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写方法每当派生自并将新属性添加到派生的类。Override the method whenever you derive from and add new properties to the derived class.

para.span: 在重写派生类中调用基类的方法，以便基类的属性复制到新的单元格，并确保也将复制任何已添加到派生的类的属性的值。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell, and be sure to also copy the values of any properties that were added to the derived class.

summary.span: 获取与单元格关联的格式化值的类型。

span.span: Gets the type of the formatted value associated with the cell.

value.span: 在任何情况下都表示 类型的 。

span.span: A representing the type in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基础的格式化值类型始终是因为文本框中仅处理文本信息The type of the underlying formatted value is always because a text box only handles text information ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定在单元格内容的类型。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the type of the cell contents. 在此示例中，属性用于确定该单元格是否包含尝试将该值转换前。In this example, the property is used to determine whether the cell contains a before attempting to convert the value. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供事件。This example is part of a larger example available in the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum/VB/form1.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法初始化所承载的编辑控件，如基中所述方法。The method initializes the hosted editing control as described in the base method. 对于每个调用，此方法还设置编辑控件的以下可视特性：For every invocation, this method also sets the following visual attributes of the editing control: - 属性设置为 。The property is set to . - 和 属性设置为 `true`。The and properties are set to `true`. - 属性设置为`initialFormattedValue`参数。The property is set to the `initialFormattedValue` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool KeyEntersEditMode (System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs e);

Public Overrides Function KeyEntersEditMode (e As KeyEventArgs) As Boolean
public: override bool KeyEntersEditMode(System::Windows::Forms::KeyEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: e
param.span: 一个 ，表示按下的键。

span.span: A that represents the key that was pressed.

summary.span: 确定是否应基于给定键启动编辑模式。

span.span: Determines if edit mode should be started based on the given key.

returns.span: 如果应启动编辑模式，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if edit mode should be started; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性控件设置为或，控件使用此方法来确定是否以外此单元格有焦点用户按下 F2 键将导致单元格以进入编辑模式。When the property of the control is set to or , the control uses this method to determine whether a key other than F2 that is pressed by the user while this cell has focus will cause the cell to enter edit mode. 此方法返回`true`如果 e 参数指示按 ALT 或 CTRL 以未修改形式的普通的数据输入密钥 （如字母、 数字、 标点符号或空间密钥），不包括按 SHIFT + 空格键，由该控件用于选择目的。This method returns `true` if the e parameter indicates an ordinary data-entry key (such as a letter, number, punctuation mark, or the SPACE key) unmodified by ALT or CTRL, excluding SHIFT+SPACE, which is used by the control for selection purposes. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认键盘和鼠标处理在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/default-keyboard-and-mouse-handling-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Default Keyboard and Mouse Handling in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/default-keyboard-and-mouse-handling-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置可以在文本框中输入的最大字符数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of characters that can be entered into the text box.

value.span: 可以在文本框中输入的最大字符数，默认值是 32767。

span.span: The maximum number of characters that can be entered into the text box; the default value is 32767.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性不会影响通过单元格的值或单元格格式以编程方式输入的文本的长度。The property does not affect the length of text entered programmatically through the cell's value or through cell formatting. 它仅影响哪些用户可以输入和编辑。It affects only what the user can input and edit. 设置所属列的属性也设置的列中每个单元格的属性。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column. 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.

span.span: The value is less than 0.
